text: Luz del Alba Rubio born in 1968, Aged 55, is one of the most important figures in the Opera world. She has done many memorable things, she is an activist and is currently, as of 2023 fighting abuse of power. She is one of 3 women to speak out of what people have done out of the 124 victims. She is known as a hero by many women in the US, Latin America and Spain. She also has a foundation which she has sung and prepared events for in Uruguay since 2010. She teaches children and adults to sing around the world. Puntaclassic Foundation & https://luzdelalbarubio.com Category:Uruguayan entertainers Category:1968 births
title: Luz del alba rubio
